document.full_text: an iranian military commander has accused german engineering company siemens of helping the united states and israel launch a cyber attack on its nuclear facilities, kayhan daily reported on sunday.
document.title: iran accuses siemens over stuxnet virus attack
lines_and_colors: an iranian military commander has accused german engineering company siemens of helping the united states and israel launch a cyber attack on its nuclear facilities, kayhan daily reported on sunday.
